articles.title: Capitol statue collection gets first Black American, replacing Confederate
articles.description: Mary McLeod Bethune, whose parents were born enslaved, was an educator, activist and presidential adviser. A statue of her now represents Florida in the U.S. Capitol.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
